meanings.definition: A slang term for U.S. one hundred-dollar bills.
meanings.sent1: I saved up all my benjamins to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: The cashier handed me a stack of benjamins after I cashed my paycheck.
meanings.sent3: My piggy bank is overflowing with benjamins - I feel like a millionaire!
meanings.sent4: She waved her hand, showering the crowd with benjamins like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The thief's eyes gleamed at the sight of the shiny benjamins in the open safe.

meanings.definition: A proper noun referring to the first name Benjamin.
meanings.sent1: Benjamins is a common name for boys in the United States.
meanings.sent2: I have a friend named Benjamins who loves to play basketball.
meanings.sent3: Benjamins always brings his pet turtle to school - it's his trademark!
meanings.sent4: In the story, Benjamins the bear was known for his love of honey.
meanings.sent5: The character Benjamins in the book was brave and kind, just like his namesake.
